task.name: i.ortho.elev
task.description: Select or modify the target elevation model.

parameter.name: group
parameter.description: Name of imagery group for ortho-rectification

parameter.name: elevation
parameter.description: Name of elevation map to use for ortho-rectification

flag.name: l
flag.description: List available raster maps in target mapset and exit

flag.name: p
flag.description: Print currently selected elevation map and exit
